verses.roman:
dui jana lañā prabhu vasilā piṇḍāte
nirviṇṇa sanātana lāgilā kahite

synonyms: dui jana lañā—taking the two of them; prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; vasilā—sat down; piṇḍāte—on the altar; nirviṇṇa—advanced in renunciation; sanātana—Sanātana Gosvāmī; lāgilā kahite—began to speak.
translation: The Lord took them both with Him and sat down in a sacred place. Then Sanātana Gosvāmī, who was advanced in renunciation, began to speak.
